file_content.text: I can't wait to leave this place. It gives me the creeps.
Ah, the only thing more powerful than the Dark Temple. Any luck getting that data?
Here's your data, as promised.
Of course.
Yes, already.
You have no idea what I had to go through to get this.
It wasn't easy.
Hey, you actually came through. Can't say I was expecting that. Can't say it's not a relief.
Now we can finally stop sending expeditions in there, wasting all those slaves who should be building monuments to the Empire.
Actually, I think data like this calls for more expeditions.
No, send more people.
Had a look at it, did you? Well, it's not really my call to make.
But I'll forward your recommendation to my superiors.
It's not a recommendation.
That's an order.
I'll make clear what you did for us. I think that'll carry a lot of weight. It's the best I can promise.
Thank you.
I'm sure they'll see the wisdom of my suggestion.
Very good.
I'm sure they will. Now, our business is done here.
Slaves shouldn't be collecting data anyway.
Yes, keep people out of there.
My superiors may feel differently. But I tend to agree with you on that point.
Anyway, I believe that concludes our business here.
Goodbye, then. And thanks for the data. Your service to the Empire will not be forgotten.
The Empire needs that data!
I've sent three separate expeditions into the Dark Temple--not one has returned.
I can't say for sure what's going on, but people who go in there--they don't come back.
I am Sith. You will address me as such, fool.
Show respect.
Show some respect to your betters.
Watch your tone.
I'm on official business, officer.
This is my duty.
You don't need bravery when you've got a good blaster.
Other people die--not me.
Then you are everything I could have hoped for.
Tell me the situation.
Sounds I heard coming out of that place would send a rancor running, if it was smart enough to run.
And here I thought bravery was a requirement for the Imperial military.
You scare easily.
Maybe if you think being scared of something that kills Sith is unreasonable.
You can survive the Dark Temple. I beg you to do me--and more importantly, the Empire--a favor.
The expeditions I sent in were looking for specific data. I can spare the manpower--they were slaves, mostly--but that data is essential.
Go on.
I'd like you to find the slaves from the expeditions and bring back any data you recover.
What kind of data was it?
Data?
We were studying a recent increase in seismic activity in the area, including possible damage to the temple itself.
The slaves from the expeditions were equipped with datapads to store the data they collected. Bring back those datapads.
This information's vital to future construction on Dromund Kaas. It's not glamorous but... will you help?
I wouldn't call it a challenge, but it seems straightforward.
Sounds simple enough.
Amazing. Fantastic. Your help is invaluable.
Of course.
I guess.
You don't have the authority to give me orders.
I don't answer to you.
You're absolutely right. But please consider that you'd be doing a valuable service for the Empire and... you'll be extremely well rewarded.
All I'm asking is for you to find the data the expedition collected. If all you find is bodies, bring back their datapads.
This information is vital to future construction on Dromund Kaas. Please help?
Oh, okay.
Perhaps.
I don't see why I should stick my neck out.
No thanks.
I should've known it would be too good to be true.
I'll mark the location the expedition last signaled from on your map. It's the best I can do.
Strange things are going on in there. Strange things.
But if you do decide to go back in there, I'd appreciate it if you'd at least look.
Nobody's been brave enough to go into the Dark Temple. Or if they're brave, they're just not powerful enough.
Well, I'm both.
Obviously. Oh, I can't believe I got this lucky.
Whatever's in that temple doesn't care if the Emperor himself signed your order.
Whatever's in there is deadly.
It's not that bad.
There's a reason they sent me in there in the first place, and a reason I came out alive.
So am I.
Sorry, my lord. I meant no disrespect. But I've seen more powerful Sith than you enter that temple and not return.
You there! Didn't I see you enter the Dark Temple? You're not even dead!
You there! Sith! Didn't I see you enter the Dark Temple? You're not even dead!
You there! Sith! Didn't I see you enter the Dark Temple? You're not even dead!
You there! Agent! Didn't I see you enter the Dark Temple? You're not even dead!
